query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <> int2 '0'

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <> int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 <> CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 = int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 = CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 = CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 < int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 < CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 < int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 < CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 <= int4 '0'

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 > int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 > CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 > int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 > CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 >= int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 >= CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE i.f1 >= int4 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE i.f1 >= CAST('0' AS INT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE (i.f1 % int2 '2') = int2 '1'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE (i.f1 % CAST('2' AS SMALLINT)) = CAST('1' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.* FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE (i.f1 % int4 '2') = int2 '0'
expected: SELECT i.* FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE (i.f1 % CAST('2' AS INT)) = CAST('0' AS SMALLINT)

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int2 '2' AS x FROM INT4_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int4_tbl AS i

expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) AS x FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE abs(f1) < 1073741824

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int4 '2' AS x FROM INT4_TBL i
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int4_tbl AS i

query: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * int4 '2' AS x FROM INT4_TBL i WHERE abs(f1) < 1073741824
expected: SELECT i.f1, i.f1 * CAST('2' AS INT) AS x FROM int4_tbl AS i WHERE abs(f1) < 1073741824

query: SELECT int2 '2' * int2 '2' = int2 '16' / int2 '4' AS true
expected: SELECT CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) = CAST('16' AS SMALLINT) / CAST('4' AS SMALLINT) AS "true"

query: SELECT int4 '2' * int2 '2' = int2 '16' / int4 '4' AS true
expected: SELECT CAST('2' AS INT) * CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) = CAST('16' AS SMALLINT) / CAST('4' AS INT) AS "true"

query: SELECT int2 '2' * int4 '2' = int4 '16' / int2 '4' AS true
expected: SELECT CAST('2' AS SMALLINT) * CAST('2' AS INT) = CAST('16' AS INT) / CAST('4' AS SMALLINT) AS "true"

query: SELECT x, x::int4 AS int4_value FROM (VALUES (-2.5::float8), (-1.5::float8), (-0.5::float8), (0.0::float8), (0.5::float8), (1.5::float8), (2.5::float8)) t(x)
expected: SELECT x, CAST(x AS INT) AS int4_value FROM (VALUES (-CAST(2.5 AS FLOAT8)), (-CAST(1.5 AS FLOAT8)), (-CAST(0.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(0.0 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(0.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(1.5 AS FLOAT8)), (CAST(2.5 AS FLOAT8))) AS t(x)

query: SELECT x, x::int4 AS int4_value FROM (VALUES (-2.5::numeric), (-1.5::numeric), (-0.5::numeric), (0.0::numeric), (0.5::numeric), (1.5::numeric), (2.5::numeric)) t(x)
expected: SELECT x, CAST(x AS INT) AS int4_value FROM (VALUES (-CAST(2.5 AS NUMERIC)), (-CAST(1.5 AS NUMERIC)), (-CAST(0.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(0.0 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(0.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(1.5 AS NUMERIC)), (CAST(2.5 AS NUMERIC))) AS t(x)

SELECT a, b, gcd(a, b), gcd(a, -b), gcd(b, a), gcd(-b, a) FROM (VALUES (CAST(0 AS INT), CAST(0 AS INT)), (CAST(0 AS INT), CAST(6410818 AS INT)), (CAST(61866666 AS INT), CAST(6410818 AS INT)), (-CAST(61866666 AS INT), CAST(6410818 AS INT)), (CAST((-2147483648) AS INT), CAST(1 AS INT)), (CAST((-2147483648) AS INT), CAST(2147483647 AS INT)), (CAST((-2147483648) AS INT), CAST(1073741824 AS INT))) AS v(a, b)
SELECT gcd(CAST((-2147483648) AS INT), CAST(0 AS INT))
SELECT gcd(CAST((-2147483648) AS INT), CAST((-2147483648) AS INT))
